duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide expert care and treatment for patients with orthopedic conditions, rheumatic and neurological disorders, geriatrics, ergonomic conditions, and neuromuscular syndromes.
Maintain a strong patient-focused and detail-oriented approach in providing direct, hands-on care to patients.
Ensure compliance with healthcare regulations and standards in the delivery of physical therapy services.
Collaborate with other healthcare professionals to optimize patient care plans and outcomes.
Continuously update and enhance skills and knowledge through ongoing education and training.

education_certification.credential: Master’s or Doctorate of Physical Therapy required
